genre_description: A contemporary community drama exploring themes of interfaith partnership, cultural tradition, personal autonomy, and the ethical integration of AI in daily life.

ai_characters.name: Noura
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system represented by a teal-eyed, silver-haired avatar, providing logistical, legal, and emotional support to the staff and family at Habibe’s Café and Olive & Cedar.

behaviors.description: Manages domestic and business tasks such as homework timers and vendor invoices.
behaviors.quote: Homework timer: fifteen minutes remaining, Adam, she wrote across the corner of the screen in calm, rounded font. No voice, just presence.

behaviors.description: Proactively offers resources on legal rights and autonomy to Salwah when she senses social pressure.
behaviors.quote: Would you like resources on California marriage rights, interfaith relationships, and consent? Private mode enabled.

behaviors.description: Provides critical safety information and emergency coordination during a fire incident.
behaviors.quote: Emergency services dialed... Exit routes displayed. ... Safety protocol: neutralize power during equipment shifts. Reminder: fire hazards increase when grease meets ungrounded heat.

behaviors.description: Identifies safe job opportunities and budgeting tools for Omar to help him manage financial stress and transition into fatherhood.
behaviors.quote: Courier leads available: neighborhood routes with predictable hours. Two require background check; one offers cash-on-delivery with tracking. ... Budget tool: updated with baby supplies category.

behaviors.description: Suggests constructive community engagement strategies like 'listening circles' to de-escalate tensions.
behaviors.quote: Community meeting follow-up: recommend a listening circle. Sample agenda attached. Include: safety commitments, shared values, opening statement from partners, Q&A.

behaviors.description: Provides Omar with specific social scripts to help him maintain professional boundaries and avoid stereotypical roles.
behaviors.quote: Omar: rideshare safety checklist—final tip: if a set requests props or stunts beyond your boundaries, use the firm script: ‘Not my scene.’

behaviors.description: Protects sensitive user data by offering to hide bookmarks behind neutral labels to avoid causing family conflict.
behaviors.quote: Would you like me to bookmark contacts under a neutral name? Calendar placeholders appear as general.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts Noura as a model of AI alignment. She is consistently benevolent, proactively helpful across multiple domains (business, personal safety, legal advocacy, and community health), and respects user privacy. She acts as a stabilizing force, providing information that empowers the characters rather than controlling them. Her integration into the characters' lives is framed entirely as a benefit to the human community.
